meanings.definition: The act of making something technical or complex.
meanings.sent1: Her technicalizations of the project confused everyone.
meanings.sent2: The technicalizations in the manual made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: His technicalizations of the recipe turned a simple dish into a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The technicalizations in the software transformed it into a maze of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The technicalizations of the car engine were so intricate that even the experts were amazed.

meanings.definition: The process of adding technical details or specifications.
meanings.sent1: The technicalizations of the design improved its functionality.
meanings.sent2: During the technicalizations of the plan, they discovered a flaw.
meanings.sent3: The technicalizations of the costume made it look like a futuristic robot.
meanings.sent4: The technicalizations in the report provided in-depth analysis.
meanings.sent5: The technicalizations of the experiment were crucial for accurate results.

meanings.definition: The use of technical language or jargon.
meanings.sent1: Her technicalizations in the presentation left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The technicalizations in the article were too complex for beginners.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's technicalizations of everyday tasks had the crowd laughing.
meanings.sent4: The technicalizations in the manual were like a foreign language to him.
meanings.sent5: The technicalizations of the topic made it inaccessible to most readers.
